page.title: 01General Description of area.
page.content: Our area is to the South and West of{Ripon's}city centre.The{River Skell flows through seven of our area's kilometre squares.West of the city is{Studley Royal and Fountains Abbey. They are owned by the{National Trust. In our area one quarter of the land is covered by urban development and three quarters by farmland. There is only one major road.It links Ripon and Harrogate,it is the {A.61.}The{B.6265}leaves Ripon to the west towards Pateley Bridge, and to the east towards Boroughbridge.The road passes through the area covered by this survey. Another feature is the the western end of the{Ripon Canal Conservationists are making efforts to reopen this derelict canal as far as the original canal basin. The{River Skell}flows through part of the survey area.
